{{cpp/filesystem/path/title|root_path}}
{{cpp/filesystem/path/navbar}}
{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl|since=c++17|
path root_path() const;
}}
{{dcl end}}

Returns the root path of the path. If the path does not include root path, returns {{c|path()}}.

Effectively returns {{c|root_name() / root_directory()}}.

===Parameters===
(none)

===Return value===
The root path of the path.

{{cpp/impldef exception}}

===Example===
{{example
|code=
#include &lt;filesystem&gt;
#include &lt;iostream&gt;
namespace fs = std::filesystem;

int main()
{
    std::cout &lt;&lt; "Current root path is: " &lt;&lt; fs::current_path().root_path() &lt;&lt; '\n';
}
|p=true
|output=
Current root path is: "C:\"
}}
